value.summary: Across all JSON files, the outputs accurately reflect the reportâ€™s study design (preclinical mouse + retrospective human cohort), main mechanistic claims (type I IFN-driven antigen presentation changes and PD-L1 upregulation), quantitative findings (all reported percentages/fold-changes/p-value), and key control/conditional results (vehicle/ICI-only limits, lipid particle control null, IFNAR1 blockade eliminating benefit).
